name: fricol
short_description: Fricol (Friendly Command Line) is a new approach to command line interfaces. It mixes a comprehensive, extensible command line language (based on natural language) with a modern UI to allow for multi-modal user input.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 2.0 (GPLv2)
